channel.title: FLF - Open Mike with Michael Thiessen
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: Faithfully Fighting (Against COVID Tyranny) for the Flock ft. Pastor John Koopman [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ December 15, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Rev. John Koopman to talk about what it was like to fight for the flock and Lordship of Christ in the midst of government tyranny during COVID. 

Episode Resource: Chilliwack FRC: https://www.chilliwackfrc.com/; JCCF News Release: https://www.jccf.ca/court_cases/r-vs-koopman/; 

SUPPORT OUR LEGAL ADVOCACY - Help us defend Canadians' God-given rights and liberties: https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/donate/; https://libertycoalitioncanada.com/liberty-defense-fund/our-legal-strategy/; Ezra Institute: https://www.ezrainstitute.com/;

JOIN US  FOR:
LIBERTY PODCASTS LIVE - Oct.23 @ Trinity Bible Chapel, Waterloo, ON: https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/liberty-dispatch-live-tickets-699808795947?aff=oddtdtcreator; & Oct. 24 - https://www.eventbrite.ca/e/liberty-lounge-live-tickets-701294319187?aff=oddtdtcreator;
and...

item.title: A Critical Dilemma ft. Drs. Neil Shenvi & Pat Sawyer [Open Mike with Michael Thiessen]
item.description:
OPEN MIKE w/Michael Thiessen ~ December 09, 2023
On this episode of Open Mike, Dr. Thiessen is joined by Drs. Neil Shenvi and Pat Sawyer to talk about their new book on Critical Race Theory called Critical Dilemma.

Episode Resource: Get Critical Dilemma here: https://criticaldilemma.com/ ;
